name: Limbus
description:
You died. Now what? You find yourself in a limbus state between dimensions. Fight to uncover your fate!  Battle through multiple rooms filled with enemies and bring them down with different kinds of attacks!

Created during the 1st semester project of Games and Apps Development course at IADE-Universidade Europeia in 2018/2019.

For more information about our course  visit this link:

https://www.iade.europeia.pt/cursos/licenciaturas/licenciaturas/games-and-apps-development
